tasks.label: Build EXE
tasks.command: pyinstaller ClubVoice.spec -y; if ($?) { $dest='\\b560\code\voice-communication-app'; $bak='\\b560\code\bak'; if (Test-Path $dest) { $timestamp=Get-Date -Format 'yyyyMMdd_HHmmss'; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $bak -Force | Out-Null; Copy-Item -Path $dest -Destination "$bak\voice-communication-app_$timestamp" -Recurse -Force; Write-Host '旧版本已备份到 bak 目录' -ForegroundColor Yellow }; Copy-Item -Path .\dist\* -Destination $dest -Recurse -Force; Write-Host ''; Write-Host '构建完成并已复制到 \\b560\code!' -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host '构建失败!' -ForegroundColor Red }; Read-Host '按 Enter 键关闭窗口'
